title: Team_MegaPari
author: Team_MegaPari
content: Hi Bitcointalk,We are happy to announce that MegaPari has been shortlisted for another prestigious iGaming award -  BSG Awards 2023. BSG Awards had been launched in 2019 and the awards ceremony is part of MARE BALTICUM Gaming Summit, the leading boutique style gambling industry conference of the Baltic and Scandinavian region. BSG Awards has become the most important gaming industry awards in the region. Now, MegaPari has been shortlisted as the Best Sports Betting Operator in the Baltics. The nomination serves as a testament to MegaPari’s commitment to excellence and innovation in the industry and further motivates its team to continue to improve and provide an unparalleled gaming experience.We invite you to celebrate with us and release a list of 20 FREE BETS for all bitcointalk users! Check out the first comment and have fun by sportsbetting with MegaPari!
